website_summaries.verdict: Sophisticated, versatile and comfortable, this sandal takes you from sandy beaches to city streets in style.
pros: Italian styling, massaging footbed, and slip-resistant sole
cons: Some with wider ankles might find this style uncomfortable

customer_reviews.title: Nice sandals , for my size 7.5 got size 8.
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased these sandals in both sizes - 7 and 8, since I'm originally is 7.5, I think that size 8 fits better, some space you have, but it's not loose, the size 7 also fits , but it was too tight for me, if you walk in it your foot slips over the sandal, so my conclusion is - if you have 7.5 it's better to get size 8.Photos attached: first one is size 8, second photo is size 7.
customer_reviews.author: Kateryna

customer_reviews.title: I've decided it's time to enjoy look and comfort even for us
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I'm the first man ever to buy these. However, I've decided it's time to enjoy look and comfort even for us, beasts. Lo and behold! It fits (size 11), it's beautiful and I love the cushioned comfort. Now it's time for the espresso trim!
customer_reviews.author: Ran Weiss

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I love this crocs sandals, but today the pair I order on April, 2016. Just broke. This is the third pair of this sandals (same model, same color) I got, the first pair was Great I wear it 2 summers, the second pair last one summer and it broke after 1 year and now this is my third one and last 2 months, considering is just getting hot and did not use them for the 2 months. Very disappointed too because I just ordered the same exact sandal in brown and in black #6 for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Patiño

customer_reviews.title: all the reviews were just perfect.. I bought these for pur trip to ...
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness.. all the reviews were just perfect.. I bought these for pur trip to Florida and I have plantar fastisciis and therefore cannot wear flat footwear at all whatsoever.. but I was desperately looking for something that would be beach friendly and so didn't want to be in my sneakers or sketchers all the time and look foolish on a beach.. they are a savoir.. I wore them for 3 days and had no complaints whatsoever.. even met two other people wearing the same and we got talking because if the sandals.. :) only wish they came in more colors..
customer_reviews.author: Abhishek Jadon

customer_reviews.title: cant believe these are crocs.
customer_reviews.text: ive never been a fan of crocs. but a girlfriend was wearing a pair to water-park day, and i was jealous of how comfy they looked and durable for a water park. i literally was online at the park buying these on here. they are great flip flops cute to look at comfortable to wear and are just a great pair of crocs i can now say i own. :)
customer_reviews.author: Mallory And Chaos

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this color, the shoe is great though!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this croc product. It holds up well and they are extremely comfortable on my feet. I will say that these are not made for wide feet. I personally have narrow feet so they work great but if you have wide feet these are not for you. I gave these 3 stars because the color is awful! The white bottom sole portion is the perfect color. The top thing part is a yellow that looks like when you have a white shirt packed away and you pull it out 2 years later with yellow stains on it. I love this particular sandal and I love croc products however this particular color is horrid.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Love love!
customer_reviews.text: OMG! Only after I received them did I realize they were Crocs. So that’s why the material is like ‘rubber’. They are the cutest and the most comfortable pair of sandals I own and I own a lot of sandals. I wear a size 9 and purchased a 9. They don’t look like they are too short, they fit perfectly so if you like your sandals a little larger, order up. You could probably dress them up if needed although I purchased mine as a lounging sandal. I absolutely love them and wish they had more colorful options.
customer_reviews.author: Niki Ham

customer_reviews.title: Love this Flip-Flop
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes you just don't know when ordering online. I read the reviews and looked at the photos. I normally wear a size 8.5 shoe. I ordered a size nine and it fit perfectly. So for the people that sized down, I don't know how. My foot is normal sized (meaning not narrow or extra wide). I'm 5'6, 130lbs. I hope this helps someone in making a choice. I haven't worn them for a long period yet, but they are quite comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: LAB

customer_reviews.title: The Bump Drives Me Crazy!
customer_reviews.text: I read many reviews before purchasing these, and am so surprised no one mentioned this. I don't know how anyone can walk around with this annoying bump under your feet. I also am surprised that I didn't really notice it prior to buying them. I think the bump is supposed to be between your toes and the balls of your feet, but the second you walk, it just ends up under the balls of your feet. It's a really uncomfortable way of walking. I'm wearing them around the house this evening to see if I can bear it or if I need to return them. They are super cute.
customer_reviews.author: Raleigh

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a handful of wears...
customer_reviews.text: I loved these shoes! I wore them maybe 8 times (in the office and for VERY light walking) and the strap broke. I am extremely disappointed. I expected much better quality from the Crocs brand. I will be contacting Crocs to file a complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Oyster White
customer_reviews.text: I love the fit and comfort of these sandals. They require a little extra effort to put on, but worth it. My only complaint is that on the white ones, the top portion has a green cast to it. The bottoms are very white. Other than that, I love them. I wore them on vacation last week and we did quite a bit of walking. My legs were not tired, my feet did not hurt, I could walk in the rain without worrying about damaging them. I would recommend them in maybe another color unless you don't mind the greenish white top portion! My daughter has the black ones and they look perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Island25girl

customer_reviews.title: Couple of things bother me about this shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I’m a size 8, ordered a size 8 and they fit perfectly. Couple of things I’m not in love with, 1) the base of the shoe is white but the straps on top of the foot look more like a faded neon yellow - I really would have liked them to be the same color. 2) when walking in them you can feel the ground underneath so they are not cushioning or protective at all. I had hoped to wear them as trendy beach shoes for an upcoming trip but now I thinking they won’t be able to handle to pebble beaches. I’m undecided on if I’m going to return or not but I am disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Jenni

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Love these sandals! My new favorite! I love all of my Crocs, and I wanted to buy these last summer, but they were constantly sold out of my size. Thank goodness for Amazon! I’ve worn them almost every day since receiving them, and I forget they’re even on! Pros: -comfortable -feels like I’m barefoot (👍👍) -supportive -not slippery -lightweight -can be dressy or casual Cons: -the straps that go around the ankle were a little more snug than I’d like, but I dipped them into boiling water and *gently* tugged on them to loosen If you like Crocs or are debating just buy them! These are too cute to pass up!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Never thought I'd wear Crocs
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as my "dressier" flip flop option for a recent Hawaiian vacation. They seemed to fit a little large and I was iffy on them when I started wearing them but the return period had passed so I kept them. I'm so glad I did!! They are really cute and comfortable and I got several comments on how unique and sexy they looked. Despite being a little long, because they're flip flops they fit just fine. I'll definitely buy them again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: seastormTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: ODD COLOR...
customer_reviews.text: Since buying my first pair of Crocs Sandals, I have been a fan. However, this pair was a BIG disappointment! :-( The coloring is WAY OFF. The sole is white but the t-strap is an odd beige(y), pale olive-like...just an odd color. I kept them and will "pretend" they are all white but...other than the odd coloring, the shoe offers the same comfort & style.
customer_reviews.author: galshopper

customer_reviews.title: Cute water tolerant sandal
customer_reviews.text: I was not sure about this item but came to really like them. They are cute. I travel a lot and these will be perfect replacement for my flip flop. The size is tough as if this Sandal is to small it might hurt between the toes and may be too tight around the lower ankle. If to big then will not keep foot in place. I am a 7.5us in Hiking running shoes, a 7 in a closed toe sandal and 6.5 in a flip flop. I chose the 6.5 and it was just right. A little snug but not uncomfortable. I like the Croc products purpose and now they have a few cute styles to choose from.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: A 9 would probably work fine, but now I'm a little gun shy about ...
customer_reviews.text: I wear size 81/2 and have thick feet with a high arch, I ordered size 8 because people said order by length not width, and I usually wear an 8 in regular Crocs. However the style of these is more slender and shallow, and I would need at least the 9 in this. I felt the bump under toes was too short for my foot in the 8 so the length is probably a true 8, ...I am returning because too short and shallow for comfort. A 9 would probably work fine, but now I'm a little gun shy about trying this style again, tho they are just as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: art detective

customer_reviews.title: Quality Compromised
customer_reviews.text: Fit great. These stretch. Buy a smaller size and they will be snug at first but then fit perfect for years. I’ve had several pairs. Update 11/2018: Four months later...these are busted. This is the second pair I got that only lasted a couple months. I thought the first pair that busted was just a freak accident, but now with a second pair - both busting within a couple months. I am extremely unsatisfied and wondering if they are selling subpar products on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Nic

customer_reviews.title: Ill-fitting sandals and unable to wear
customer_reviews.text: While the sandals are cute, they don’t fit well. The right foot fits fine but the left is dissimilar in length to the right and makes them too tight (in the left foot) to be worn. Seems the strap is too short or tight and digs into my foot between the toes. Unhappy with the product and feel I wasted my money on them. They are supposed to be a size 9. Unsure why they seem to be a mismatch as they both read a size 9W and I have never had a size issue with shoes before. Hopefully seller will address the situation and offer a solution.
customer_reviews.author: Cindi R.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy these shoes if you have large and wide feet!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes to go to Hershey park so I can wear them in the water park and all the other rides so I didn’t have to change shoes. They were tight around my ankle and toes. They were terrible in the water I would just slip out of them, definitely not made for water. I got blisters in between my toes and on the back of my heels. If they had the next size up or made in a wide foot they might be better. These shoes are not made for people with wide feet at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Lakics-Seidler

customer_reviews.title: Yip yip hooray!
customer_reviews.text: I. Love. These. Crocs! I never thought I’d say that. I hate the look of the classic crocs, but I’ve always been intrigued by the durability and how easy to wash they are. These sandals are not only irresistibly comfortable from the first time you put them on, but they’re so dang easy to clean off! And they look nice! I’m an 8-8.5 in most shoes so I got both an 8 and an 9 to see what worked. The 9 is perfect. They seem like they run a little narrow. I hope these puppies last because as of now, I couldn’t recommend these more.
customer_reviews.author: LexiTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a couple days on a tropical island and they destroyed my feet, within an hour of wearing them, the skin on my heels, front of my ankles, and side of my toes was completely ripped up and bleeding, I ended up going barefoot instead despite the rocky paths, it's a miracle the blisters didn't get infected. Finally got back to the mainland and got my sneakers, but still had a week of traveling with a lot of walking and driving, and both were excruciating, I was limping the whole way, had to tear my socks from the open wounds every night. Awful. I threw them away.
customer_reviews.author: E.A.

customer_reviews.title: Like walking on clouds
customer_reviews.text: So comfy! Like walking on clouds! I'm a hairstylist and I just cannot wear crappy shoes anymore. With a full day scheduled on my books I was surprised at how good my legs, hips, and back felt afterward. And you do not have to compromise on style for comfort with these. They are super cute and make my feet feel dainty and petite. I usually wear a 6-6.5w, after reading reviews I decided to size up and go with a 7 and I'm glad I did! They fit me perfectly. They were packaged poorly but I left that for another review. Good thing they were Crocs or they may have been ruined in the rain!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica De Los Santos

customer_reviews.title: Cute and super comfortable, walked literally 100+ miles in these
customer_reviews.text: Wore these all around Malaysia and Singapore for three weeks, they were fantastic. I didn't have issues getting them on and they were comfortable after a lot of walking and if they got dirty I could just rinse them in the shower. I didn't have any issues with them stinking or any problems, really, other than you might get a weird tan line! I wouldn't wear them for days and days without rotating with other shoes, because mine did start to rub just a little at my ankle when I wore them several days in a row. But for what I paid and how much I loved wearing them, they were worth it for just one trip!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly comfy, wore on a 2.5 mile walk as soon as I got them and they did alright! 2.5 miles is a lot to ask of any sandal! Feet def hurt at the end, but I was pleasantly surprised at how long it took for them to start hurting. No chaffing around the ankle loop, but a little on the toe strap, as others noted, they are slippery when you sweat. I wouldn't wear them on a hike, but work, the fair, waterpark would all be great. Good amount of padding for me but if you have tender feet, you might want more shoe than this.
customer_reviews.author: LEO

customer_reviews.title: works for me
customer_reviews.text: When I first got them I was like...ohhh poop my feet are to fat. But thankfully they kinda stretch out so please ...don't stretch and pull them they will get there. Defiantly not easy like slip ons but its to be expected. I have fat wide feet and I feel like it took about 2 months to really feel like these were the most comfortable sandals I've ever had lol. some people really hate these or bash them but if you are not super picky and do not have problems with most sandals im sure these will be fine......also....since they kinda stretch try to avoid people stepping on the back of them because then they might get too lose.
customer_reviews.author: Rosebud

customer_reviews.title: Sooo comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: These are now my go-to shoes for walking my dog because they are quick to put on and so darn comfy! I can even lightly jog in them when my reactive dog and I need to make a quick get-away to avoid other pups in the neighborhood. The shock absorption in the heel is incredible. And the style is simple yet elegant so you can wear for both super casual or slightly dressier occasions. I wear a 6.5/7 in most shoes and purchased these in a 7 and they’re perfect.
customer_reviews.author: ShoSho

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 7 months.
customer_reviews.text: Within 7 months these sandals have expanded a whole shoe size (I had to wet the flip-flops, then place in the dryer to shrink back to a size 5. The sole shrunk back, but the straps remained stretched). And now the piece that goes between your toes just broke. I was walking around my home... and the sandals broke.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Cut, Comfortable and Stylish
customer_reviews.text: The padding, sole and fit makes these sandals comfortable. Croc’s have a great reputation for comfort and this particular pair of sandals did not disappoint. I’ve always wanted to try a pair but never cared for the overall design of the shoes they carry. These however, look super cute on and are stylish. I wore them while on vacation and walked quite a bit. - I was surprisingly shocked at the comfort. These sandals are not your typically comfort “mom shoe”.- I received many compliments and people were shocked that they were Crocs.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Banda

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoes! I got them for a beach vacation, but kept wearing them once back home. They are lightweight and comfortable. I cannot feel the grips while wearing. Even after walking around several hours shopping and running errands. They subtle enough to go with just about any style. The only flaw is they don't come in half sizes. The 6 fit, but I felt they'd BE bothersome after a long day. The size 7 is loose and gets a bit tricky at times. Other than that, they're great.
customer_reviews.author: SE

customer_reviews.title: Tooooooo Tight!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The band around the ankle is way too tight. It is pulling the rubber between my toes up very tight. I followed the reviews and sized up and it still wasn’t enough. I had to struggle to even get my feet in them. Once I did, I felt my pulse in my ankle and like the skin between my big toe and second toe was throbbing after 2 minutes of walking on my carpet. Idk what to do. Guess I bought the rush shipping for no reason. Waste of money. I’ll be returning these and doubt I’ll size up.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Thong is way too tight.
customer_reviews.text: If I could give a zero star review I would! The thong on these shoes is ridiculously tight. I ordered these and two other pairs of Croc sandals in an 11. The other shoes fit fine but these were unwearable. I had someone who wears a size 9 try them on and even she was not able to wear them comfortably due to the tightness of the thong! It's unfortunate because the arch support on this show is fantastic and the sole is one of the most comfortable I've ever felt, but the thong makes them impossible to wear for any length of time. What a shame!
customer_reviews.author: KAN

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: I wear 8.5 so I ordered a 9. This is my second pair of these. I wear them almost every day. I'm almost 9 months pregnant and my feet grew a half size during my pregnancy so I needed to replace my old ones which are several years old and still in great shape. I have these in more than one color. They are great for everyday wear and anytime water is involved. I take them overseas with me. They weight almost nothing. I wear them to the office with dresses. You can dress them up or down. They are my idea of the perfect shoe.
customer_reviews.author: A B

customer_reviews.title: Ankle strap too tight for me, but otherwise great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Let me preface this review with the fact that i have huge wide feet and big calves and ankle bones, and should have known better than to get shoes that have a thing that goes around the ankle. That being said -the sole part of the shoe and the toe area are perfect! I really loved them right when i put them on. And the dark gray/brown color was great too, but after a few hours that ankle strap really started to dig into my skin, and i dont think its the type to stretch. So im returning them. But im sad because ankle strap aside, i was very very happy with how these looked!
customer_reviews.author: leah

customer_reviews.title: Should call these blister makers
customer_reviews.text: These are awful. They look cute and the soles are quite comfortable, but the straps are stiff, uncomfortable, unadjustable and pretty much a recipe for blisters. I initially bought these for my partner because she loves sandals that lace through her big toe, but after and hours she horrible blisters. So I tried them next and I also ended up covered in blisters. Maybe there is some perfect set of feet out there that these would fit in a way that didn’t tear the wearers feet apart, but for both my partner and me, they were a disaster.
customer_reviews.author: Kittypoocaca

customer_reviews.title: Very Cute and Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I have worn these a few times now and they are very cute and comfs! I bought them for vacation which is postponed for the time being, but am enjoying them for daily wear. It's amazing; the sole doesn't flop away from your foot at all when you walk. The bottoms are very cushy and supportive. I haven't worn them in water but since they are all rubber I imagine they would be great and dry fast. Also because they are rubber and they do squeak a little when you walk but that is my only complaint. They are great!
customer_reviews.author: James Joshua Dickman

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes for Walking on the Sand!
customer_reviews.text: I hate wearing flip flops to the beach because they flip sand up my legs, which drives me crazy. Because of this, I searched for a rubber (i.e. easy to clean), thong-style sandal that offers good support without the "sand spray" up the back. These sandals checked all the boxes on my list. I usually wear a 6.5 or 7 and ordered both a 6 and 7. The 7 was a little more comfortable, and I was able to return the 6 quite easily.
customer_reviews.author: Liz G.

customer_reviews.title: My third pair
customer_reviews.text: I love these little sandal. It fits my narrow foot nicely. I normally wear 7.5 AA but wear the size 7 in this sandal. They do stretch ever so slightly. They hold up well but is not protective to the foot at all. Very flat with no cushion so I don't recommend wearing for long walking events or walking on rocks. Perfect for the beach with sand & water to have a little something to protect your feet from the shells.
customer_reviews.author: Ali Cat

customer_reviews.title: Fits too tight, order a size up.  Hard to put on, but looks good if you're able to wear them.
customer_reviews.text: Other Crocs sandals fit fine in a size 9 (I'm normally 8 1/2). However this style has no way to get the shoe on to your foot, as it does not stretch much. Wish it had a zipper up the back to be able to get into it. The thong strap between your toes is too tight for the size ordered. Going to order another size up to see if it's easier to get into and if it still looks good. Beautiful-looking sandal though, if you can get it to fit.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Not a good fit
customer_reviews.text: I have worn crocs for years. of course starting with the regular old on Crocs but now I always wear croc sandals in a size 7. I found these to be extremely tight and uncomfortable around the ankle. My feet were also barely contained. I've never had this issue with any crocs before so I just returned it. My feet are not unusually large fat wide so I would recommend unless you have a very thin ankle and foot size up.
customer_reviews.author: bameiboo

customer_reviews.title: No problem feet should have no problem!
customer_reviews.text: I want to say I love these. They’re versatile! Wear them with pants or dresses/skirts! They look great! I bought them because someone with plantar fasciitis said that their foot didn’t hurt with them and that was true for me for a little bit. I wore them to a podiatrist appt and he told me I needed more support. The soles of these sandals are very maleable so you feel everything on the floor. If you’ve got good feet, wear them. If you got problem feet like mine, skip them.
customer_reviews.author: Marty_onthego

customer_reviews.title: Bummer
customer_reviews.text: I wear crocs all the time, and I love them. My friend recommended this style because they can be work friendly. I wear a size nine in all other styles of crocs, but these are SUPER small! Seriously, I had to look at the number twice to be sure I was seeing it correctly. If you dare order these, DEFINITELY GO UP A SIZE. I had already ripped the tags off, so I can’t return them. Total disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Sometimer

customer_reviews.title: I'm digg'n these#
customer_reviews.text: I like these...a lot. I'm a true 9 and bought a 9. My left foot is bigger than my right. Though I have no hangover, I probably should've gone with a 10. I have fat wide feet and normally don't wear thongs, but since crocs are made wider in the front, I figured why not...My yabba dabba do's actually look cute in these...I.M.O...but the ankle strap on my left shoe is a bit tight (because of my fat foot)..I've been stretching the band since getting these earlier today in hopes that it yields a bit more. We'll see...
customer_reviews.author: Tori G.

customer_reviews.title: If you was blisters than these are for you!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get these, regretted the purchase after. No arch support, back strap cut into my heels and left sores between my toes. Some of the reviews suggested buying a size up which I did. Total fail. Threw in the closet after trying to wear a few tones. I wish I could have returned the crap pair of shoes, but missed the return window. I do not recommend these overpriced feet killers.
customer_reviews.author: Darby

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Sandals
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable sandals I've worn. I've worn plenty. The soles feel like I'm walking on air (almost like there's actually some air in there) and I bounce naturally with every step. The design is stylish, at least as far as I'm concerned (and I'm really the one whose opinion matters since I'm the one wearing the shoes lol). I've already recommended them to one person because she was surprised at not hearing me walk when sandals are usually loud. I highly recommend these sandals.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, stylish, defective(?)
customer_reviews.text: My wife reported these shoes looked and felt great. She wore them intermittently for a month. Unfortunately, a few days after the 30-day return policy ended, as she was going down a slide with our toddler, the toe wedge separated from bed of the shoe. The plastic/foam/material did not pull through the sole of the shoe, but actually separated. We will try supergluing it back together, but overall very disappointed in the durability and would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon7Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These shows are very comfortable. The first time I wore them the back of the sandal did hurt my skin a little. The second time I wore them I hesitated because I didn’t want to get a blister. If you are like me and you have thicker ankles you will have to stretch out the part that hugs your ankle before wearing to break them in. Once you’ve stretched them out you are good to go for future wears!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: So comfy
customer_reviews.text: I've been a flip-flop wearer for decades, and when I started getting foot pain, I needed something a little more supportive with an ankle strap (to stop me from gripping with my toes). These are super lightweight, with a tiny bit of arch support, good cushion (compared to my regular flip flops) and are super cute. My husband says they are "hot" which is impressive, considering they are crocs! My foot pain is gone and I love wearing these all day, every day.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Arrived promptly
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for vacation. I have a pair of these I bought at the croc store and they are perfect. These fit the same except around the ankle they are way to tight. I had to stretch them several times a day and then the were fine. But after a while they tighten back up. I bought two other pair from the croc store later and one pair the ankles were too tight. And I returned them. These I really needed for vacation so I just kept stretch them hard. Eventually they will wear out. But it’s the make not the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Traveled all summer with these on. Great for most terrains (beach, mountains, city). Very comfortable. Look great with virtually every outfit. Easy to wash. Two minor drawbacks that are inevitable and I don't hold them against the shoe: when wet foot slips around on the shoe, but that's to be expected I think. Also after a long time (like I said, all summer of daily day-long wear) I started getting a bit of skin irritation around the ankle bit. They shoe no sign of wear yet but I may get another pair for the future, just because I love them so.
customer_reviews.author: Paulina

customer_reviews.title: Too small and too big....need 1/2 sizes!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love these Sandals. I ordered a size 8, that is my normal shoe size. They ended up leaving blisters in between my toes and on the back of my heels. I returned them for a bigger size. Size 9s were WAY to big. Maybe if they made 1/2 sizes in these they may have worked out. I had to return the 9s as well and go with a different name brand of sandals. These were a bust :(
customer_reviews.author: Lane Morock

customer_reviews.title: Smaller Than Crocs Isabella Style
customer_reviews.text: Tried this Crocs style and the Crocs Isabella (of which I already own in a the bronze/nude color but wanted a strappy sandal in black). I much prefer the Crocs Sexi Flip style and color (a solid black rather than the translucent jelly black of the Isabella style), but it's just too tight! If Crocs made half sizes, I suspect a 7.5 would fit perfectly! But the 7 is too tight and the 8 is too long. So I have to settle for the Isabella (in a size 7 which fits just fine!)
customer_reviews.author: Jenny&Allen

customer_reviews.title: Love these so much
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome and I love them. The initial fit is a bit tight and uncomfortable but after your feet break them in and adjust they are awesome. They are extremely uncomfortable initially though so just keep that in mind and it took me about 2-3 weeks to break them in but afterwards they were great. These are my favorite shoes to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Inez

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these shoes
customer_reviews.text: When you mention the brand Crocs its not uncommon for people to jump to the assumption that you are talking about the bulky not so fashionable slip ons. Don't get me wrong I love how comfortable of my bulky ugly Crocs are but I was pleased to get some Crocs that I don't feel like I'm wearing clown shoes and can still be comfortable. I wear these things everywhere and with all types of outfits, dressy and casual!
customer_reviews.author: The Dice

customer_reviews.title: I seriously love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. Extremely comfortable and very fashionable. I ordinarily wear an 8.5 and while Amazon recommended going down to an 8, I took the advice of some other reviewers and went up to a 9 and am so glad I did, There is no way an 8 would fit. My toes go almost all the way to the end. They do look "long" when you first pull them out of the bag, but once you put your foot inside they conform beautiful. I think these are my new favorite shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Melodie Sheppard

customer_reviews.title: Love ' em!
customer_reviews.text: I like minimalism iny everyday shoes because it gives me a better sense of balance while protecting my feet. These are super comfortable. In Crocs I normally buy a size 6, but I sized up with these after receiving a pair for Christmas and they didn't fit due to the strap between the toe and the closed end of the heel. These fit perfectly at a size 7. I would recommend a million times over.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Sulouff

customer_reviews.title: This half sizer should have ordered up
customer_reviews.text: I am a true 9.5, so I took the advice of the rest of the reviews and ordered down, even though I usually order up when half sizes are not available. Unfortunately, I will need to return the 9s and order the 10s after all, the 9s are just a bit too snug (from the thong to the heel). Other than being too tight, they seem to be extremely comfortable and surprisingly supportive. Will update this review if the 10s prove to be anything other than fantastic as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren M.

customer_reviews.title: Really cute sandal!
customer_reviews.text: I love the style of these and I don't think the look could be achieved in other materials, it is unique to the Crocs plastic material. Very slim and flattering. A little tight but loosened up with wear. I have slim feet and ankles so since they were tight on me I don't think these would work well for someone with thick ankles or wide feet.
customer_reviews.author: LeeT

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but a little tight
customer_reviews.text: I'm a huge Croc fan. Seriously I have at least seven different pairs in my closet right now (sans garden crocs). For comparison, I have size 9 feet and high arches. I know that over time, Crocs tend to stretch out a bit and am hoping these will do the same. They are super cute, but tricky to get on/off and rub between my toes. I've had some advice to put them in boiling water for 30 seconds then put them on with some toe-socks to help stretch them out a bit. I'll try that and update after. The arch support in these also are lacking in that support area.
customer_reviews.author: CD

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy summer staple!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical buying crocs, but so happy I did. These flip flops are soooooo comfortable. I basically wore them every day this past summer & they were perfect for hot Texas weather. There is excellent arch support and no blistering after walking for hours. These would be excellent for travelling because they take up little space. Your feet will thank you for buying these sandals!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Will not recommend
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for this sandal for over 8 years. Saw someone with it and never knew the brand, last year sometime I found it on amazon and immediately bought it. I regret it because it did not last long, for something that’s made of rubber I didn’t expect it to burst. The straps burst out and there isn’t a way to fix it because of the material it’s made of. It is a beautiful sandal, I really do love it but I can’t pay the price for it, it didn’t even last 6 months. I am very sad
customer_reviews.author: Dezire Adara

customer_reviews.title: Great support, rubbers difficult
customer_reviews.text: I love that these are rubber and I feel like I can run in them and am wearing nothing. It’s amazing. They slip right off and walking in summer rain had never been easier. That being said, they are a pain to get on and I felt like a polly pocket squeezing into my rubber shoes. They look great on and I get compliments whenever I wear them. I really can’t complain for the price- they’re great and help with my high arches. I got a size 9 and would say I’m more a 8.5-9, and think these are a little snug, so you may want to size up. If you need some cute athetletic sandals, highly recommend these
customer_reviews.author: Megan Sigetic

customer_reviews.title: I own a pair of crocs??!!
customer_reviews.text: I never thought there would be a day I would own a pair of crocs and here we are. I bought then for a beach trip I had this summer where I would be walking to and from our hotel and didn't want to get my nice leather sandals ruined in the sand. These were perfect. The arch support is actually nice in them and my feet didn't get tired. I get tons of compliments on them and look forward to wearing them. They are a slight pain to put on with them being rubber and there is no clasp or anything, but small price to pay.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Martin

customer_reviews.title: Ordered a half size up & too big, but still keeping them.
customer_reviews.text: After scouring the reviews, I ordered an 8, being a size 7.5. Depending on the sandals, my wide feet sometimes spill over a 7.5. These are a little big, but I’m planning to keep them and hope I don’t get blisters. They’ll probably end-up with the teenager, who is a true size 8, and I’ll eventually order the size 7. *Love these. Wore them shopping all day in Ruidoso, and planning to take them on our cruise next month.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: More yellow then oyster
customer_reviews.text: The soul does not match the same color as the tea strap. The tea strap is a yellowish color where as the bottom is a white color. I expected oyster which is what the description color is. I don’t know if I will actually wear them as is or If I will embellish the tea strap portion and make it an original design
customer_reviews.author: Gina I.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a die-hard flip flop wearer but wanted something that looked a bit less casual. These are comfortable and I love that they stay put on my feet, don't flop around like a flip flop and have a sleek look on your foot. Great price and I would buy again. BTW, I wear a 8-9, ordered the 8. They are snug but due to the cushiness, they aren't uncomfortable.. Next pair will be a half size bigger. These might make me give up flip flops!
customer_reviews.author: Debidoo

customer_reviews.title: I'm so pleased that Crocs finally came out with this pearl color
customer_reviews.text: Have purchased this same style in black, brown, pink, blue and have been wanting white for a long time. I'm so pleased that Crocs finally came out with this pearl color. One of the most comfortable sandals I've ever worn. Can wear them all day and on hot asphalt with no issues. They hold up really well and I get tons of compliments. I bought a second pair for my cousin...Hawaii, here we come!
customer_reviews.author: DWd

customer_reviews.title: Great every day sandal
customer_reviews.text: I have used these sandals 24/7 through the last 5 summers. They are comfortable, easy to put on, waterproof, and they look nicer that flip flops and many other sandals. They do stretch out however after a season or so of non-stop use, so I suggest you order next year's pair in the Fall. I have some pairs that have gone for two seasons, but they get pretty loose into the second season. You have to stretch them to put them on, so that is what stretches them out ... but if you figure I've worn them maybe May through September (120 days) per season, that's a lot of use. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Almost free

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but Still Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: These were not as white as I was hoping and expecting them to be. The sizing for the shoe is off as well. I went a size up after reading reviews, but the toe piece still felt too tight and not comfortable, while the bottom piece was way too big at that point. I kept tripping on the extra material that exceeded the length of my foot. They are cute style wise, but I just did not find the right fit for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jenmharrison

customer_reviews.title: Business casual comfy flip flops
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something nicer I could wear to work but extremely comfortable. These fit the bill. I already have a pair of croc flops, so I was already drawn to them because of that but the stylish design is perfect for a day at work.
customer_reviews.author: Connor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoe
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I saw a dolphin trainer at a marine institute wearing them and I had to figure out what they were. These are cozy. I have bone spurs in my heels and i can wear these all day without issue. They're perfect for slipping on to run errands, to yoga, to the pool, to work. I got the black ones and I can pair then with black work trousers and no one is the wiser that I have Crocs on. If you have puffier ankles, i could see you having issues with them being tight. They probably run a little bigger than expected, ne,t time I'll order down a size.
customer_reviews.author: Random Tabitha

customer_reviews.title: Shrunk
customer_reviews.text: After enjoying these sandals as one of my favorite sandals of all time, one of them SHRUNK. I did NOT put them in the washing machine, they sat in my car for a couple days and maybe when sitting in the sun they shrunk almost a size or two down, completely. I’m highly disappointed and Don’t know what to think!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: oh man! these are comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Awesome awesome !!!!! Love how comfortable this is . The reason I got it here on amazon instead of CROCS is because I can save on the additional shipping that CROCS charge. It runs true to size. It feels like my foot is painted with this design. I walked over 5 miles with this on over the weekend and oh man! these are comfortable . LOVE LOVE LOVE These.. wish they came in different colors too... only thing is that they get heated up a lil bit in the summer heat but nothing that would burn your foot... super comfy
customer_reviews.author: Amazonholic

customer_reviews.title: Runs small in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: I love these but they sizing is different. Initially I ordered a size 8 because I have a pair of Crocs flip flops in an 8 (I’m normally an 8.5 in all other shoes) but the 8 was too tight between my toes. So I ordered a 9, seemed to feel better, wore them around the house for a few hours and still too tight (see the photo of marks they left) My plan was to take these to Europe because my other Crocs are amazingly comfortable for walking in. So now I’ve ordered a size 10 and will report back...
customer_reviews.author: wine.wife

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfy
customer_reviews.text: A friend of mine had these on our last vacation. We hit a beach that was rocky. She wore these everywhere including in the water. I had to try them bc they were so cute. Most comfy flip-flops!! I will be ordering other colors. I am a true size 7 and the 7 in these fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Candace Martin

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Cute.
customer_reviews.text: I love this sandal by Crocs. I have been wearing them for years and I am on my third pair. I wear them almost everyday in the summer. I even wear them to church. They are so comfortable and look really cute on my feet. I always take them on vacation too because I can walk all day and my feet never get tired or sore. My size and color were sold out on the Crocs website. I was lucky to find them on Amazon last week. To be on the safe side I ordered 2 pair. I wear a size 10 and ordered a size 10. They fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Movie watcher

customer_reviews.title: Not good for chubby feet
customer_reviews.text: I bought these sandals for a vacation to Hawaii. I figured they would be great for the beach and able to get wet but also since they have some arch support I could wear them to walk around. They were perfect for both however I felt that the distance between the toe prong and the back of the heel was too small. I wish this was adjustable some how. The toe prong kind of dig into my skin and made it uncomfortable to wear after a day. I was hoping maybe they would stretch out but didn’t.
customer_reviews.author: Arika

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe
customer_reviews.text: I received my shoes very quickly. I was slightly disappointed that the straps were more yellow (or glow in the dark yellow) than white. They fit well; tight and not floppy. The strap between my toes got a little aggravating however. I do have to agree with one of the other reviewers...these shoes are the closest you will come to being barefoot with shoes on. Not sure I would purchase again but I'll keep these.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer S

customer_reviews.title: Love these sandals!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 7, and they fit perfectly! I’m a 7.5 and didn’t know if they would fit but I’m happy I didn’t size up. I have narrow feet and small bony ankles and the ankle strap actually fits me, I have a problem with sandal straps being very loose. I don’t think these would work for someone with wide feet or large ankles. The foot bed is thin but surprisingly cushioned. My new favorite sandals!
customer_reviews.author: MrsMZ

customer_reviews.title: Size up
customer_reviews.text: I'm normally a 9-9.5 shoe, but I bought the 9 and it was too small (right shoe in the photo) and the 10 I bought fit me better (left show photo). The 10 fit me better since the anckle strap, arch and toe ridges fit my foot, but the heel I felt was too loose. Compared between the 9 and 10 I wish there was a 9.5 for the perfect fit, but the 10 is much more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymously

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and cheaper than croc store.
customer_reviews.text: Great and comfortable sandal. More supportive than your standard “Old navy style” sandal but not as supportive as an orthopedic shoe. Stylish and comfortable but on super hot humid days they get a little slippery because of the plastic type material. They fit true to size maybe a half size larger. Ie:: If you’re 8.5 got with an 8. CHeck croc online sometimes their deals are cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Carra Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Way too small
customer_reviews.text: I like the style and the footbed, but the sizing is really strange. I am a US 7.5 for sneakers and US 7 for sandals. I ordered US 7 the first time and it was too snug. I ordered a US 8 again and it's still too small! It's like they reserved a big area for the toes, and not much is left for my fat "palms". If you are like me with cute short toes, definitely size up. I have never gotten a 9 and the idea of it feels weird, so I will try the warm water trick the other reviewers had mentioned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Half sizes should order a size up
customer_reviews.text: Other reviews were split as far as what to do if you normally wear a 1/2 size. I wear a 7.5 and took a gamble by ordering a 7. Should have sized up to an 8. But I will say they are very comfortable had they fit properly, so I think I’ll give these to my mom and order another pair for myself in a size 8. If you’re between sizes, size up and you’ll be very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: If you’re doing any walking . Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I bought these based on the reviews saying they were comfortable and easy to walk in . All I did was try these on and already the back of my heel was turning red from the rubber rubbing up against my heel. I know walking in these would cause irritation not to mention the hole you slip your foot is you have to force your foot through . I don’t have fat feet and never wear a wide but these just didn’t work for me .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are the most comfortable flip flops/thongs I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: A hairdresser was wearing these and I commented that they must be comfortable and she raved about them and owning them in various colors. I brought them and they are everything she said they were. You really feel like you aren't wearing anything but yet you have support!
customer_reviews.author: E. Bradley-McCabe

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure about what size to get. I went with a 6. I usually wear 6-1/2 in most shoes but these fit perfectly. Very comfortable. Not much arch support, and I have high arches, but no problem with my feet hurting. Be careful when you're walking though, if you dont pick up your feet the front of the sole can turn under. Only happened once. I think they are very cute!!! Great for summer!!
customer_reviews.author: Junglejoyce

customer_reviews.title: Shrunk in the sun!!!!  Crappy product!
customer_reviews.text: I loved these from the first day I wore them on a trip to the lake. We hiked around a little and played in the water and they were perfect, stayed tight to my foot and were comfortable. They were left in the sun, 2 days later I went to put them on and they had shrunk!!! I use a size 7, my daughter uses a 5 and they are too small for her!!! So if you want a sandel that you can't leave in the sun.... These may be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Shantel

customer_reviews.title: I got the 6 and the fit is perfect. They are comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Got these as compact flip flops/water shoes for an international trip but they have become my go-to summer shoe. I typically wear somewhere between a 6-6.5. I got the 6 and the fit is perfect. They are comfortable, durable, dress up nicely with a sun dress, but are perfect for beach wear and won't slip off while wading. If they get dusty or dirty, wipe with a wet cloth and they look good as new. If they ever wear out-- which presently doesn't seem likely--I will definitely repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: halfwitamerican

customer_reviews.title: These sandals are going to travel the world!
customer_reviews.text: I’m anxious to give these sandals a try when we travel overseas, since they come highly recommended by many travel bloggers. I look forward to wearing them around the towns & dressed up a bit at dinner. They fit exactly as expected & are very lightweight. I think they’ll be a great shoe for packing light.
customer_reviews.author: Melly

customer_reviews.title: Great fit - Not good with water
customer_reviews.text: They fit great at size 8 and I am exactly a size 8 (I can ocassionaly get into a 7.5 depending on the shoe) If you have sweaty feet or will be around water THESE ARE NOT THE SHOES FOR YOU, you will slip all over the place. They are comfortable to walk around in and compact enough to travel with in a small bag. They fit great over the ankle and don't irritate my ankles ir between my toes. I take them with me everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: NZiegler

customer_reviews.title: My favorite sexy summer sandal ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love the feel, the openness of the sandal, the sleek sexiness, oh there are more colors! Easy to slip on and take off, goes with any outfit. If they get dirty just rinse and dry off with a paper towel and pop them into an overnight or yoga bag and you are ready to go. I have a pair I leave in my Cali house and one for my Wash. house. I will order more no doubt.
customer_reviews.author: Tb333

customer_reviews.title: Keeping for comfort over actual colors
customer_reviews.text: The ordered color was white. The colors it actually comes in are white (sole) and a green tinted cream for the top part you actually see. Disappointing cosmetically, and the insert between toes is a bit uncomfortable. Overall probably not worth the price. The heel does feel very good.
customer_reviews.author: NC

customer_reviews.title: Love but runs small
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They are super comfortable but do run small. I NEVER have an issue with shoes being small because I have small feet (US 5 EU 35) and usually have issues with them fitting big. These were a tad too small for the 5. My toes legit come to the edge and I don’t like that plus it Hurts where it goes between the toes. So for me, a normal size 5, the size 6 was a good choice. Overall they are worth it I love them, super comfy and super cute. Crocs without the ugliness! Can’t beat that! 😂❤️
customer_reviews.author: Jeniffer

customer_reviews.title: If your ankles swell, do not buy these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the sexi-flip Croc because I'd had a similar pair, which I loved. I do not love these! I thought they were the same as the Serena Croc sandal because they look the same, but they are not. The band around the ankle is smaller and higher on the sexi-flip--bad news if your ankles swell at the end of the day, as mine do.
customer_reviews.author: DDV

customer_reviews.title: No bueno!!
customer_reviews.text: These are awful. I already own three pairs and I LOVE THEM!! So I was excited to order another one. This one is not soft rubber, like my others ... it is tight, inflexible, rubber-plastic material that has no give and feels unpleasant in the footbed.
customer_reviews.author: AbbyGirl

customer_reviews.title: Raised Ridge In The Footbed Made These Uncomfortable To Wear For Long Periods Of Time
customer_reviews.text: These have a raised ridge at the bottom which you can see in the picture if you look closely. The problem for me was that my foot didn't fit exactly on that ridge so I felt it was jutting up into my foot and making the shoes uncomfortable to wear for long periods of time. I don't have this on other pairs of Crocs that I own. I bought them for a trip and ended up switching back to my Croc flipflops because these were not comfortable to wear for long periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and cute, but not a touring shoe
customer_reviews.text: Advantages: Decent arch support, good shock absorbency, work well for a wide foot, attractive/non-clunky appearance, stays cool in hot weather, waterproof, easy to clean Disadvantages: Shoe moves around a lot as I wear them, and the toe bar sometimes gets pushed back under the ball of my foot Kind of annoying to put on since you have to maneuver your foot through the ankle opening Not great for beaches, as these scoop up lots of sand if you're not careful Overall, I would recommend these for someone who is looking for a comfortable, casual sandal for occasional wear. I would not recommend them for all-day vacation wear, since they are not very secure on the foot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All day comfort.
customer_reviews.text: I am not a huge fan of crocs, but these don’t look like a “croc” and most people don’t believe me when I tell them they are. These shoes are extremely comfortable, and I have walked all day at the amusement park in them and when I got home 11 hours later my feet weren’t killing me! I am only sad I will have to put them away for winter.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Frey

customer_reviews.title: Read my review
customer_reviews.text: Yup, tried to listen to people for half sizes, I sized up to an 8, I’m a 7 1/2 & nope, too big.. size down, should have listened to the others who said size down for half sizes.. kind of mad about it, now I have to order a 7 .. they should fit snug not loose, you will be happy if u size down, don’t make the same mistake. I give 4 stars bcuz they are big, when I get the 7 I’ll change it to 5
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Cute and simple
customer_reviews.text: I think this sandal is really cute, and at a great price. Its very simple yet stylish, and since its rubber its easy to clean. I find it to be pretty comfortable, though I do think it runs a bit small. Not on the footbed, but on the strap. The opening around the ankle is insanely small, so its a bit of a struggle putting these on and taking them off. Also, the length of the strap is a little tight which makes it a bit uncomfortable but overall I do really like these.
customer_reviews.author: Lexibrooke1

product_meta.title: Crocs Women's Sexi Flip-Flop
product_meta.description:
Crocs, Inc. is a rapidly growing designer, manufacturer and retailer of footwear for men, women and children under the Crocs brand. All Crocs brand shoes feature Crocs' proprietary closed-cell resin, Croslite, which represents a substantial innovation in footwear. The Croslite material enables Crocs to produce soft, comfortable, lightweight, superior-gripping, non-marking and odor-resistant shoes. These unique elements make Crocs ideal for casual wear, as well as for professional and recreational uses such as boating, hiking, hospitality and gardening. The versatile use of the material has enabled Crocs to successfully market its products to a broad range of consumers.

Crocs, Inc. is a rapidly growing designer, manufacturer and retailer of footwear for men, women and children under the Crocs brand. All Crocs brand shoes feature Crocs' proprietary closed-cell resin, Croslite, which represents a substantial innovation in footwear. The Croslite material enables Crocs to produce soft, comfortable, lightweight, superior-gripping, non-marking and odor-resistant shoes. These unique elements make Crocs ideal for casual wear, as well as for professional and recreational uses such as boating, hiking, hospitality and gardening. The versatile use of the material has enabled Crocs to successfully market its products to a broad range of consumers.
feature_bullets: T-STRAP ITALIAN DESIGN: The Sexi Flip-Flops for women feature a unique t-strap design with the same comfort you love from Crocs The sleek Italian design is sure to turn heads in spring, summer and beyond
ICONIC COMFORT: From everyday wear to date night, these t-strap sandals for women are flexible and made of Croslite material for Iconic Crocs Comfort Ankle strap mixes additional support with style
MASSAGE-LIKE FEEL: Your foot is the priority in these women's flip-flops The intentionally placed circulation nubs offer a massage feel with each and every step
LIGHTWEIGHT: These gladiator sandals for women are incredibly lightweight and fun to wear The flexible material is perfect for when you're on the go or just hangin' out
WOMEN'S FLIP-FLOP SANDALS: The Sexi Flip-Flops for women combine a minimal design with a sophisticated style that stands out The neutral colors are sure to fit in with any wardrobe
